title: Why MVC is so important
shortDescription: MVC allows developers to maintain a true separation of concerns, devising their code between the Model layer for data, the View layer for design and the Controller layer for application logic.
longDescription: MVC allows developers to maintain a true separation of concerns, devising their code between the Model layer for data, the View layer for design and the Controller layer for application logic.

title: Authentication vs. Authorization
shortDescription: There is a difference between authentication and authorization. Authentication means confirming your own identidy, whereas authorization means being allowed to access the system.
longDescription: There is a difference between authentication and authorization. Authentication means confirming your own identidy, whereas authorization means being allowed to access the system.

title: Object-Relational Mapping
longDescription: I have really loved learning about ORM. It's really simplified teh way I create queries in SQL!

title: Mongo DB
longDescription: Another type of database, alternative to SQL. Instead of tables and rows used in SQL, Mongo DB represents data as JSON objects. Unlike SQL you don't need to predefine your tables, you can just store JSON objects without predefining.
